lead_paragraph: The painter, playwright, performance artist and children’s book author and illustrator lives on the Upper East Side.

headline.print_headline: Where Her Fantasies have Free Rein
headline.main: Where Cynthia von Buhler’s Fantasies Have Free Rein

snippet: The painter, playwright, performance artist and children’s book author and illustrator lives on the Upper East Side.
abstract: Multimedia artist Cynthia von Buhler loves her objet d'art- and antique-filled Upper East Side apartment, which she rents out for film shoots.
